ftag = fix ftag (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : tag := match m with | V => 0%nat | I m0 x0 t0 _ => if eq_dart_dec x0 x then t0 else ftag m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => ftag m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> tag
top_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (A m k z) = top m k z
succ_pred_clos : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil
fpoint = fix fpoint (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : point := match m with | V => (0%R, 0%R) | I m0 x0 _ p0 => if eq_dart_dec x0 x then p0 else fpoint m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => fpoint m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> point
A_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> A m k (A_1 m k z) = z

```coq
intros m k x z Hinv Hsucc.
rewrite cA_eq with (m := B m k x) (k := k) (z := z); auto.
rewrite A_B with (m := m) (k := k) (x := x); auto.
destruct (eq_dart_dec x z); auto.
destruct (eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z); auto.
Qed.
